> **__Rune Pouch Setup__**
**__PvME Recommended Rune Pouch Setup__**
*Note: All PvME guides should follow this set up; however, switching over may take time.*
⬥ <:blackpouch:656786565359599626> : <:Waterrune:536252660165115905> <:Deathrune:536252659586433024> <:Earthrune:536252659808731137>

**__Utilizing Rune Pouch Setup__**
⬥ **General Mage** <:blackpouch:656786565359599626> <:bluepouch:656786565527502858> <:greenpouch:690848914638766082> <:redpouch:690848915020447745>
    • Spells used: <:bloodbarrage:537338981747261446> <:icebarrage:537340400185245701> <:incitefear:856635090783567902> <:exsanguinate:856635090745950258> <:smokecloud:856635090641879050> <:SBSLunars:565726489467682816> <:disrupt:535614336207552523> <:Veng:543478434953822208> <:sd:537341954392850442> <:Cept:543478434509357098> <:HealOther:567727985851891715> (BP <:ent:567727987274022924>)

⬥ **Non-Magic** <:bluepouch:656786565527502858> <:yellowpouch:690848914949144616> <:purppouch:656786565149884427>
    • Spells used: <:SBSLunars:565726489467682816> <:disrupt:535614336207552523> <:Veng:543478434953822208> <:smokecloud:856635090641879050>

⬥ **Non-Magic (no Smoke Cloud)** <:blackpouch:656786565359599626> <:bluepouch:656786565527502858>
    • Spells used: <:disrupt:535614336207552523> <:Veng:543478434953822208>

⬥ **Normal Spellbook** <:greenpouch:690848914638766082>
